dict.acceptation: 架子，搁板；棚；沙洲，暗礁；格，层；

sent.orig: The books on the lower shelf are easier those on the upper shelf.
sent.trans: 下面架子上的书比上面架子上的书容易些。

sent.orig: These types of products are shelf-stable with nearly unlimited shelf-life at room temperatures.
sent.trans: 这类产品在室温下几乎有无限的保质期。

sent.orig: This explanation evidently conveyed something to the girl who searched shelf after shelf.
sent.trans: 这一解释显然使售货员有所领悟，所以她一个个货架地寻找。

sent.orig: The combination of wood and glass makes this book shelf shelf absolutely unique!
sent.trans: 木头与玻璃的组合更是这款产品独一无二的亮点。

sent.orig: Light shelf: Each shelf loading capacity s below 150 kilograms.
sent.trans: 轻型货架：每层货架载重量在150公斤以下。
